title: After I login, black screen. [6.7 Update]
body:
Just updated my client to 6.7 everything is fine with that. get to the login screen pass that. but when i enter the home screen for league nothing shows up just a message in a box in the corner saying nothing. Could someone please tell me whats going on and how i can prevent it, tried restarting. and my computer is decent and has been playing well for league up until now.
Thanks!

replies.body:
This happened to me as well.

I ran a repair (launcher screen click the ? at the top right and choose repair + wait) and that fixed it
I don't even have the ? or any other box. It is completely blank.
